#Draiocht - I know it used to be 'organised' but one could hardly count on the few labelled ids and ctrl-f is needed to find anything anyway, so I just
#merged everything together to more easily search, copy, and paste. Plus it was getting to a point where there were enough changes that is was
#pointless to compare with vanilla anyway. Hope this doesn't mess with anyone's submod.

#Using this primarily for wet tropics with 'exotic' diseases
tropical = {
	5140 5141 1164 1169 1171 1172 2948 2949 798 1120 1121 1122 1124 1125 1136 1137 1138 1143 1144 1145 1146 1149 1150 1152 1153 1154 1155 1160 1161 1162 1163 1249 2248 2250 2252 2254 2256 2266 2278 2280 2286 2292 2294 2249 2253 2255 2257 2267 2281 2283 2285 2289 2291 2293 2295 788 1195 1196 1197 1198 1199 1200 1201 1202 4049 517 527 529 530 531 533 534 535 537 539 540 542 543 544 545 546 547 548 549 552 553 561 564 568 570 572 573 574 580 1946 1947 2026 2028 2029 2030 2033 2034 2036 2037 2038 2039 2041 2043 2048 2049 2050 2080 2081 2083 2084 2089 2090 2091 2092 2099 2100 660 663 664 666 6971 2159 #Using this only for true deserts, generally with under 200mm or so annual precipitation, and with sand dunes or sun-baked rock
arid = {
	432 433 434 435 438 455 575 576 2230 2231 2232 2233 2234 390 391 392 393 403 404 394 4269 384 385 386 389 2327 2328 2329 2330 2331 2332 2335 2336 2337 2338 2339 2343 2344 2345 2347 1786 1790 1791 2200 346 347 349 350 351 365 1111 1128 1131 1132 1133 1127 2320 2321 2323 2324 2448 2449 2450 2456 2457 2458 2460 2472 2475 2474 1129 1130 1148 1156 1157 1158 1159 2243 2244 2246 2247 2259 2260 2261 2262 2263 2264 2265 2268 2269 2271 2272 2273 2274 2275 2276 2277 2279 2282 2284 2287 2288 774 1221 1232 1206 1207 1208 1209 1212 1215 1220 1226 1229 1230 2024 2768 2766 2767 2778 2779 2792 2789 2790 2764 2765 2773 2776 2777 2780 2781 2782 2783 2784 2785 2786 2788 2793 2795 2801 1174 1801 437 1784 1785 2349 2350 707 710 711 712 2121 2122 2123 2124 2192 512 513 514 2088 2064 2066 863 865 866 867 876 877 1808 2491 2498 2616 780 781 2863 2869 2870 2875 2876 4051 4052 4206 4207 4209 4210 4502 4506 4507 6953 6956 6957 6961 6962 6963 6964 6965 6966 6967 6968 6969 6970 7479

	#Beyond Typus Changes

#Generally using this for areas around or above the tree line, with at least sporadic permafrost, average winter temperatures of at least -20C, and yearly mean temperature of at least sub zero
arctic = {
	1034 1035 1036 1037 1038 1039 1040 1041 1042 1043 1044 1045 1046 1047 1051 1052 1054 1059 1061 1062 1064 1067 1068 1069 1070 1071 1072 1073 1074 1075 1076 1077 1078 1080 1963 1964 2427 2425 2426 1780 2445 2428 2429 2433 2430 2432 2443 2431 2436 2442 2437 2435 2438 2439 2440 998 999 1005 1006 2592 2574 676 705 2128 2129 2134 1781 1782 1783 1787 1804 1805 1807 1811 1812 371 1104 1105 1777 315 2025 4205 4514 4515 4516 4518 4519 4520 4690 4691 7496
	#4690 doesn't exist in vanilla but it creates a nicer border.

	#Beyond Typus New
	3111 313 1955 4122 1958 4258 7866 1776 5649 7864 7747 3112 3113 3114 3119 3284 3285 4129 677 2130 1810 5177 5178 4968 4969 4970 4971 5186 5188 5190 5191 4977 4976 4978 4980 4985 4990 4991 4992 4993 4994 4995 4996 4997 4998 5006 5007 4999 5123 5120 4983 4986 4989 2599 5001 2595 5002 5040 5041 5192 5189 5195 5015 5008 5009 5010 5011 5014 5176 2575 5012 997 5093 5067 5068 5069 5070 5071 5072 5073 5074 5075 5076 5077 5078 5079 5588 5589 5590 5591	1962 5592 5593 5594 5595 5596 5650 5673 5674 5675 5676 5677 5678 305 4257 5722 5080 5081 5082 5084 5912 5913 5914 5915 5916 5917 5918 5919 8000 8001 8002 8003 8004 8005 8006 8007 8008 8009 8010 8011 8012 5193 5087 5573 5587 5639 5580 5641 1806 5003 2594 4151 8545

	#Iffy NA borderline subarctic I've changed over 5 times already
	#1000 1003 5003 5005 1806 2594 5055 2577 2576 996
	#21 11 18
	
	#VU - San Felipe Fix
	2601 5900
}

#Generally places where snow is not unusual, but not guaranteed in a year and average winter temps is below 10, but above 0
mild_winter = {
	6 12 13 14 15 26 1981 1982 1983 1984 44 54 55 1775 1931 1874 87 88 89 90 91	92 93 94 95 96 97 98 99 100 1742 1743 1744 1866 1865 1878 2973 2974 2975 167 168 4384 170 171 172 173 174 175 177 178 179 180 181 182 183 184 185 186 187 188 189 190 191 192 193 194 195 196 198 203 207 209 1745 104 107 108 111 1769 1862 233 234 235 236 237 238 239 240 241 243 244 1860 1861 249 139 141 4704 4756 1765 1766 2746 159 282 283 284 285 286 287 1764 2406 2410 2411 2412 2413 2414 2447 322 411 1846 5295 413 415 416 417 418 421 424 425 426 427 428 429 432 433 435 436 446 447 577 437 438 439 440 441 442 443 454 455 457 456 463 464 468 2349 2356 2362 2363 2370 2416 2417 678 689 693 695 696 697 698 699 700 701 703 704 708 709 713 715 726 1816 2112 2120 2131 2132 2133 2135 2136 2138 2169 2170 2177 2179 2180 2181 2182 2183 2184 508 2069 872 891 892 896 918 934 935 936 937 941 950 1012 1017 1018 1023 1024 1025 1026 1818 1830 1831 1837 4131 1786 1774 131 1828 1827 1974 1973 1970 1969 1879 1877 3000 2195 2199 2206 2207 2208 2210 2211 2212 2213 2214 2216 2217 2218 2220 2222 2223 2224 2229 2230 2232 2234 2236 897 873 874 938 2515 2545 2546 2547 2548 690 691 692 694 2113 2137 2139 2178 3001 4180 4181 4182 4183 4184 4185 4186 4187 4188 4189 4190 4191 4192 4194 4195 4198 4206 4207 4208 4211 4223 2741 2745 4227 4228 4359 4360 6951 7416 7417 7418 7419 7420 7421 7422 7423 7424 7425 7426 7427 7428 7429 7430 7431 7432 7433 7434 7435 7436 7437 7438 7439 7440 7441 7442 7643 7498 7499 7500 7501 7502 7503 7504 7508 7509 7510 7511 7512 7529 7536 7551 7552 7558 7607 7608 7609 7610 7611 7612 7613 7614 7692 7695 7696 7697 7698 7699 6924 6927 6928 6929

#Generally places where snow is nearly guaranteed any given year, and average winter temperatures hover around 0C
normal_winter = {
	1 2 3 4 5 7 17 23 24 25 27 28 35 36 37 38 39 53 1930 1985 40 41 42 43 48 767 770 771 2993 2752 2995 49 50 51 52 56 57 58 59 60 61 62 63 64 65 66 67 68 69 70 71 76 79 81 82 86 1757 1758 1759 1762 1763 1858 1859 1868 1872 1876 2955 2956 2957 2958 2959 2960 2961 2962 2963 2964 2965 2966 2967 2968 2970 2969 2971 2972 132 133 134 135 153 154 155 156 157 158 162 1770 1772 1863 1864 1318 250 251 252 254 255 256 257 258 259 260 261 262 263 264 265 266 267 269 270 271 272 273 274 275 276 277 278 279 280 281 288 289 290 2424 291 292 1771 2407 2997 465 466 469 470 471 472 474 476 477 478 479 2359 2364 2409 444 445 450 453 459 461 702 705 714 720 722 723 730 2108 2109 2110 2111 2114 2118 2119 2125 2126 2187 2188 2191 2747 2134 2193 1032 1033 1852 1031 898 902 915 943 946 947 949 951 954 955 956 957 958 959 960 961 962 963 964 965 966 967 968 969 970 1847 1951 1952 1953 1940 1939 1841 1938 1935 1936 1937 1842 1834 1960 1941 1942 1943 1944 1945 1966 1967 1968 1971 953 2011 2023 2010 449 2196 2204 2227 2228 331 2305 2306 2307 900 916 917 942 944 987 2670 2513 2519 2549 2550 2551 2552 2553 2554 2555 2556 2557 2558 2560 2561 2562 2365 2367 2366 2369 2357 2354 2360 2355 2368 2361 2358 2352 2351 2353 2639 4200 4201 4202 4203 4221 732 733 734 735 736 737 1013 1845 2694 2742 2744 4229 4230 4231 4193 4522 5850 6979 7314 7315 7320 7505 7506 7507 7513 7514 7515 7516 7517 7518 7519 7520 7521 7523 7524 7525 7526 7531 7532 7541 7542 7543 7544 7548 7549 7550 7555 7557 7559 7560 7561 7562 7563 7564 7566 7567 7568 7569 7570 7571 7572 7573 7574 7575 7576 7577 7578 7579 7580 7581 7582 7583 7584 7585 7588 7589 7590 7591 7592 7593 7594 7595 7596 7598 7599 7600 7602 7604 7605 7606 7618 7619 7620 7621 7622 7623 7624 7625 7626 7627 7629 7633 7634 7635 7636 7637 7638 7639 7641 7644 7645 7646 7647 7648 7649 7651 7652 7653 7654 7655 7656 7657 7658 7659 7660 7661 7662 7663 7664 7666 7667 7668 7669 7670 7671 7677 7678 7679 7680 7682 7684 7686 7687 7688 7689 7693 8485 8732
